title: what are these 2 fonts?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204004805im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mexico_6246.JPG)

i’d like to recreate this look for my own visual identity, so any help naming the fonts seen above is appreciated.  
also, i’d love suggestions if you think there’s a font that might work better for my purposes—thanks!  
oh: the idea is to create a stamp that inks the negative space, all lettering and graphics will show up as the color of the bare paper underneath, as in this concept sketch, if i used charcoal ink on light gray paper:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204004805im_/http:/typophile.com/files/newlamoorestamp_5451.JPG)

 [‹ Fonts from Sci-Fi novel.](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204004805/http:/typophile.com/node/51842 "Go to previous forum topic") [Merry Christmas font ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204004805/http:/typophile.com/node/51838 "Go to next forum topic")
author: lamoore
